dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1972
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reports that the Internal Revenue Service, convinced of their religious convictions, has absolved them of back taxes and penalties. Describes the trees growing in the neighborhood and repeats the idea of the sacrament of the present moment.
